commits.message:
[GOC-3352] PR1: Add POST-only OTP address persistence (#61482)

* [GOC-3352] PR1: Add POST-only OTP address persistence

Implements POST-only address persistence for OTP checkout flow.
Creates shipping and billing addresses via API and stores IDs in localStorage.

Key changes:
- Added usePersistOTPAddresses hook for POST-only address creation
- Integrated hook into DeliveryStep via withOTPAddressPersistence HOC
- Jotai atoms for localStorage persistence of address IDs
- Non-blocking error handling to avoid disrupting checkout flow
- Parallel address creation using Promise.allSettled

Files modified:
- usePersistOTPAddresses.ts: Core hook implementation
- DeliveryStep/index.js: Integration with form submission
- DeliveryForm.spec.js: Updated test expectations

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

* Update usePersistOTPAddresses.ts

* fix tests and code cleanup

* Update DeliveryForm.spec.js

* Update usePersistOTPAddresses.spec.ts

---------

Co-authored-by: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.message:
[GOC-3352] Add PUT address endpoint for customer address updates (#61505)

- Create putAddressById.ts with usePutCustomerAddress hook
- Add 'customer.put.address' request ID to RequestIds enum
- Export usePutCustomerAddress from customer data-access module
- Uses PUT method for updating existing customer addresses
- Includes ProductParams interface for delivery-related parameters
- Supports localization via useLocalizeParams hook
- Adds proper fetch span attributes for observability

This provides a dedicated endpoint for updating addresses, separate from
the PATCH endpoint, allowing for cleaner address update semantics.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-authored-by: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
